tech_driven.description: Xavier's interest in blockchain leads him to participate in a campus hackathon, where he meets a group of like-minded peers and mentors.

character_driven.description: Xavier faces a dilemma when he has to choose between a lucrative job offer and continuing his education, testing his commitment to his long-term goals.

upcoming_trends: Increased use of blockchain for secure voting systems in student elections.
Integration of AI in education to personalize learning experiences.
societal_shifts: Rising importance of digital identity management due to increased online activities.
Shift towards remote work and learning, impacting how Xavier interacts with his peers and professors.
tech_driven_plot_points: Xavier develops an app that uses blockchain to ensure the authenticity of academic credentials, gaining recognition from his university.
